pages.text:
[Page Title: Grand Bohemian Charleston | Downtown Charleston, SC]

Skip to content Hotel Accommodations Amenities Dining Local Area Happenings Hotel Services Accessibility Contact Exceptional Events Meetings Weddings Inspired Experiences Art Gallery Rooftop Bar Wine Bar Wine Blending Gallery Sign Up Book Now 
843.722.5711

55 Wentworth Street
Charleston, SC 29401

Explore Your Hidden Agenda

Give in to grand luxury, elevated experiences and artistic glamour.

Explore Your Hidden Agenda

Give in to grand luxury, elevated experiences and artistic glamour.

Art Gallery

Escape into the artful details and leave room for the unexpected.
Learn More 
Wine Blending

Take your palate beyond flavor and create your own signature blend with our experienced sommeliers.
Learn More 
Rooftop Bar

See Charleston from new heights with hand-crafted cocktails and stunning views.
Learn More 
Destination

In a city where nearly everything has a story to tell, come discover Charleston’s deep Southern roots and its vibrant arts and entertainment scene.
Learn More 
Grand Bohemian Wine Bar

Discover a world of flavor, one glass at a time.
Learn More 
A New Kind of Inspiration

Elevate your stay with boutique luxury experiences that pique your curiosity and spark your passion.
Experiences 
A New Kind of Inspiration

Elevate your stay with boutique luxury experiences that pique your curiosity and spark your passion.
Experiences 
Art Gallery

Escape into the artful details and leave room for the unexpected.
Learn More 
Wine Blending

Take your palate beyond flavor and create your own signature blend with our experienced sommeliers.
Learn More 
Rooftop Bar

See Charleston from new heights with hand-crafted cocktails and stunning views.
Learn More 
Destination

In a city where nearly everything has a story to tell, come discover Charleston’s deep Southern roots and its vibrant arts and entertainment scene.
Learn More 
Grand Bohemian Wine Bar

Discover a world of flavor, one glass at a time.
Learn More 
A Luxurious Affair

Elegant taste and inspired spaces are just the beginning.

Atrium View

Treat yourself to an artful view of our atrium featuring original pieces and vibrant green grass. Unwind in style in plush bedding and take a pause from your adventure.

Double Queen

Take a moment or catch a blissful night’s rest in style. Enjoy original artwork, chic décor and an outside view of Charleston.

King Room

Rise a little later than usual in your plush and spacious room, featuring original artwork and gorgeous natural light pouring in.

Premium Room

Find yourself tempted to stay in, with a spacious room designed to help you recharge. Enjoy a soak in the tub, the decorative art, and the view of Charleston or our art atrium.

?>

Feed Your Curiosity

Discover vibrant, French-inspired cuisine at Élevé that will nourish your soul with an artful, unexpected twist. Later, unwind with hand-crafted cocktails at the rooftop bar and lounge.
Dining 
Feed Your Curiosity

Discover vibrant, French-inspired cuisine at Élevé that will nourish your soul with an artful, unexpected twist. Later, unwind with hand-crafted cocktails at the rooftop bar and lounge.
Dining 
?>

Go Beyond the Ordinary

Familiar comforts meet inspired service at Grand Bohemian Charleston. With artful spaces and modern amenities, discover Southern hospitality at its best.
Amenities 
Go Beyond the Ordinary

Familiar comforts meet inspired service at Grand Bohemian Charleston. With artful spaces and modern amenities, discover Southern hospitality at its best.
Amenities 
Uncover Your Passion

We invite you to follow your inspiration and make the most of your stay with our exclusive selection of luxury experiences and unique things to do in Charleston.

Jan 20 | 2:00 pm

Jan 22 | 2:00 pm

Cocktail Classes

Jan 22 | 4:00 pm
